item.title: Singtel unveils National Day film for 2020
item.description:
Singtel’s latest National Day film celebrates the resilience of Singaporeans as they face the challenges of COVID-19. Titled This is the year, the film is available on Singtel TV and social media platforms. This is the year highlights the difficulties brought on by the pandemic and pays homage to the spirit of progress that drives Singaporeans forward. Source: Singtel video. This is the year we will not have the F1 race...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-unveils-national-day-film-for-2020/

item.title: Entries are now being accepted for the inaugural HUAWEI Film Awards
item.description:
Filmmakers in the Asia Pacific region can win prizes for films made on Huawei smartphones. The top prize includes $20,000 and a trip to Bangkok for the awards ceremony. An event in Singapore on December 21 will showcase a film by local director Boris Boo. Source: Huawei. Poster for the HFA. Huawei has launched its first film awards, the HUAWEI Film Awards (HFA), in the Asia Pacific region. The competition aims to encourage filmmakers and content creators to use Huawei smartphones to demonstrate their creativity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/entries-are-now-being-accepted-for-the-inaugural-huawei-film-awards/

item.title: Sony has introduced the Picture This Festival for the Planet competition
item.description:
Sony Pictures Television Networks (SPTN), working with the United Nations Foundation, has launched the Picture This Festival for the Planet. The short-film competition encourages emerging filmmakers, storytellers, and changemakers globally to share their visions for a positive future for the planet. Representing over 70 countries, participants are invited to submit videos inspired by the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The SDGs are a collection of global goals adopted by the United Nations to address poverty, protect the planet, and promote prosperity for everyone...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sony-has-introduced-the-picture-this-festival-for-the-planet-competition/
